entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gimli 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or light snow changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
